summary: Fifteen year ago, Carlos went to the cinema to meet Júlia, his university colleague with whom he was in love. She never showed up. Carlos was left waiting in the lobby alone. While he waits... See full summary »
cast: Murilo Benício|Carolina Ferraz|Emílio de Mello|Beth Goulart|Irene Ravache|Alberto Szafran|Christine Fernandes|Silvia Helena|Luiza Mariani|Drica Moraes|Marcela Moura|Sílvio Pozzato|Bemvindo Sequeira|Luciana Valério
title: Amores Possíveis
